website_summaries.verdict: A great choice, especially if you're interested in Ninja's automatic programming features, but consider the Mega Kitchen System for extra power and accessories.
pros: A lightweight, full-sized blender featuring Ninja's auto-iQ automatic programming
Reliable, with plenty of power (1200 watts) and suction pads to keep the blender stable on your countertop
cons: Doesn't come with additional accessories like single-serve cups
Might require a few cycles to blend harder foods to a smooth consistency

customer_reviews.title: My pitcher broke after 5 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I loved this blender and used it maybe three times a week for the last 5 months. A week ago I noticed leakage and then saw that there was a massive crack in the jug. I called ninja to see what they could do but they offered for me to purchase a new jug. No coverage and just very insincere apology. I told the rep I’d much prefer to purchase a brand new blender than to replace a jug that didn’t even last 6 months. Terrible experience. Even worse customer service
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A Daboul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high-powered blender
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high-powered blender. I had another less powerful ninja which lasted 3 years of rigorous use (smoothies, baby food, purees) but it never did well blending harder foods. This one is amazing I have been using it for purees and smoothies and it works like a charm. It successfully blends harder foods into a nice smoothie consistency. I would say the only drawback is I find I have to run the smoothie setting twice for a nice consistency, but not enough of an issue to take a star from my rating. Great blender at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like what everyone else is saying
customer_reviews.text: Like what everyone else is saying, overall it's a great blender but you cannot FIT it between your Cupboard and Countertop!! It's so annoying that people who use this have to separate it or find another place for it other than on your Countertop. If it was just a half inch shorter it could fit. The base is a bit bulky too. It does a great job making smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: ↯  SPARKY  ↯

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have had blenders and juicers before, and this product tops them all. It blends 100 percent better than the others, and is easy to clean. I also have a very nice juicer, and I prefer this Ninja blender over my juicer. This is the best buy for your money.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Nammack

customer_reviews.title: Works, but really LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: Could wake the dead. Wish it was shorter too. Membrane switches are great for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Shuts off on its own
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Shuts off on its own. Auctions to the counter so you can walk away knowing it is not going to move. It’s perfect for making my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: wisewoman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Makes great smoothies. Powerful motor gets everything blended properly. Used almost every day at the house. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Voelkner

customer_reviews.title: day 1 its great made 10 qts of blended fruit mixture really smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: day 1 its great made 10 qts of blended fruit mixture really smooth only thing I taste is the kiwi seeds untouched really great IMO will adjust review if needed as time goes by
customer_reviews.author: abba

customer_reviews.title: Great for margaritas
customer_reviews.text: This blender will blend anything and not bog down. Milkshakes, protein shakes, frozen drinks and anything else you might want to make in it. It's true my awesome and worth the money. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous blender! I use it everyday, it is a staple for my morning smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: tosha paris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blender!!! It really does blend the ice better than the lower cost models.The pitcher is not very heavy though. it chips easily
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Seal

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for the money
customer_reviews.text: Such great value. Our previous blender would get jammed up on frozen blueberries. This has no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Ninja for life!
customer_reviews.text: A heads up, to those who claim the plastic cracked when they used the Ninja. Don't run it or place in hot water before or right after use. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Roberts

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO HAPPY I BOUGHT IT. IT LITERALLY MAKES MY PREPPING TIME MUCH EASIER & SHORTER.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Saoud

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a ninja!whatelse can I say!i got one for 2 other friends and like me they just loved!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabete Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: It can make a lot of difference things
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been making smoothies for my husband who is on a diet. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: arnetta l nembhard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This blender is incredile. It is well eorth the extra cost over smaller units typical of what is in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deane

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the finest blender I've ever owned. Easy to use, clean and operate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: brian h henderson

customer_reviews.title: This blender works great! And I love the IQ technology - no ...
customer_reviews.text: This blender works great! And I love the IQ technology - no guess work on if all the pieces are chopped up!
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: It is a powerhouse, but It is much larger than I really need.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: I can attest to the sharpness of the blades as I am likely scarred for life 😬, but lesson learned. Using this daily for protein shakes and smoothies. Loud, but works well. No complaints so far, though hubby wishes there was an easily removable plug to add ingredients while blending.
customer_reviews.author: Sock Monkey Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. The blades crush all of my frozen ice and fruit within seconds. I love the preset options for smoothies and purée. It’s loud but who cares!
customer_reviews.author: qSunflower

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Best blender I ever owned. Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Davenport Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I made milkshakes for the grandkids. I was really impressed on how well it worked. I was surprised at how large it is and how much space it takes up on the counter. My 35 year old Kitchen Aid was a lot smaller. I would highly recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this blender. My only wish is that the jar were glass & not plastic. Plastic already shows signs of scratches but I like the job it does.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Too many drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Unit is excessively tall to fit under many counters. As reported in other posts, pitcher is fragile and has deep gouges inside. Very powerful as advertised. No instructions so I had to find the manual online. Not worth the effort in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher exploded after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Can’t figure out how to get replacement even tho I bought the warranty offered. Angry
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: The horsepower and the three blades make it great for anything
customer_reviews.text: The horsepower and the three blades make it great for anything. Makes great smoothies in a few seconds using frozen fruit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite appliance. I make cauliflower rice in 3 to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite appliance. I make cauliflower rice in 3 to 4 pulses. I use it for everything. It is fast and things come out in uniform size, which is not like a regular blender at all. Icy's and smoothies are done within a minute. It cleans up very easily. I don't know how I did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I've had my blender for about 5 years and it still works great. It's large and easy to clean. The blades are still super sharp. It blends soups without exploding from the heat creating pressure and it can also blend frozen drinks so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Che Barr

customer_reviews.title: if I really want good quality, performance
customer_reviews.text: Since I got married. this is my second and last blander. That's what I really wanted. My Daughter have one, and she told me, if I really want good quality, performance, and price, I should buy Ninja. .
customer_reviews.author: Olga Hayashi

customer_reviews.title: All in pieces
customer_reviews.text: Did not get a chance to use this product, it was all busted up by the time I got to me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Great blender. Very powerful and super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Very powerful and super easy to clean. Only issue is appliance is a little too tall to sit on kitchen counter and fit under top cupboards. I store lid in drawer to make it fit under top cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Anne from Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender! I juice with it, make smoothies, its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jana L Schumacker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Recently updated my post after receiving the replacement. Wonderful blender!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: Ninja Countertop Blender with 1000-Watt Auto-iQ Base for Shakes, Smoothies and Frozen Drinks with 72oz Total Crushing Pitcher (BL688)
product_meta.description: The Ninja blender 1200 is our first Auto-iQ standalone blender with more power than we have ever Delivered before. This blender provides 1200 watts of power making this our most powerful standalone blender yet. Auto-iq technology provides intelligent programs that combine timed pulsing, blending, and pausing patterns that do the work for you. It takes the guesswork out of drink making. Our XL 72 oz. Blender pitcher's total crushing technology delivers excellent professional power with blades that pulverize and crush through ice, whole fruits, and vegetables in seconds. No more need to Chew on your Chunky smoothies, with total crushing technology everything gets blended, so you will have a smooth and even consistency every time. The pitcher, blades, and lid are BPA free and dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Auto-iq technology features timed, intelligent blending programs that do the work for you, no guesswork required
Xl 72 oz. (64 oz. Max Liquid capacity) total crushing blender pitcher pulverizes ice to snow in seconds for creamy frozen drinks and smoothies
The pitcher, blades, and lid are BPA free and dishwasher safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
